title: Port beacon chain
body:
> I found that #1339 became a huge ticket beyond just "helper functions". Instead, open this one for an overview.


![](https://i.imgur.com/NZBO33B.png)


## BeaconChainDB
### Role
- Provides database interface.

### Progress
- [x] DB APIs are done in [py-evm#1373](https://github.com/ethereum/py-evm/pull/1373) 
- [ ] **[TODO]** [Fork choice rule](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/master/specs/beacon-chain.md#beacon-chain-fork-choice-rule) -> waiting for the spec to  be finalized.


## BeaconStateMachine
### Role
- Provides state transition.

### Progress
- [x] Basic forkable architecture: [py-evm#1373](https://github.com/ethereum/py-evm/pull/1373)
- [ ] Port functions from `beacon_chain`: Under construction :construction: 

### APIs
#### Process
- [x] [`import_block`](https://github.com/ethereum/beacon_chain/blob/ccf75cc679601b53e03fb5a410fc3262c503ace1/beacon_chain/state/state_transition.py#L709-L743): needs to extended `compute_state_transition` logic.
    - TODO: set state roots of the block
- [x] [`compute_cycle_transitions`](https://github.com/ethereum/beacon_chain/blob/ccf75cc679601b53e03fb5a410fc3262c503ace1/beacon_chain/state/state_transition.py#L686-L706)

#### Propose
- `serenity.blocks.SerenityBlock.from_block(block)`: setup the context for proposing the block
